select * from (SELECT p.*, sd.style_pic, sc.style_color_pic, sd.brand, sd.brand_name, sd.devt_type devtType, sd.devt_type_name devtTypeName, ps.pack_type, ps.enable_flag, ps.scm_send_flag, ps.bom_status, ps.confirm_status, ps.reverse_confirm_status, ps.design_tech_confirm, ps.design_tech_confirm_date, ps.bulk_order_clerk_confirm, ps.bulk_order_clerk_confirm_date, ps.bulk_prod_tech_confirm, ps.bulk_prod_tech_confirm_date, ps.post_tech_confirm, ps.post_tech_confirm_date, ps.size_lock_flag, ps.size_confirm_say, ps.size_confirm_status, ps.tech_spec_lock_flag, ps.tech_spec_confirm_say, ps.tech_spec_confirm_status, ps.tech_spec_file_id, ps.apparel_labels, ps.spec_notice, ps.special_spec_comments, ps.to_big_goods_date, ps.to_design_date, ps.bom_rhd_flag, ps.bom_rhd_date, ps.bom_rhd_user,
ps.size_rhd_flag, ps.size_rhd_date, ps.size_rhd_user,
ps.tech_rhd_flag, ps.tech_rhd_date, ps.tech_rhd_user,
ps.foreign_id as pack_foreign_id, ps.tech_spec_video_file_id FROM t_pack_info p LEFT JOIN t_pack_info_status ps ON (p.id = ps.foreign_id and ps.del_flag = '0') left join t_style sd on (sd.id = p.foreign_id) left join t_style_color sc on (sc.id = p.style_color_id and sc.del_flag = '0') where p.del_flag = '0') t ${ ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT tpi.id, tpi.design_no, tpi.style_no, tpi.create_date, tpi.prod_category_name as categoryName, tpis.confirm_status FROM t_pack_info tpi JOIN t_pack_info_status tpis ON (tpi.id = tpis.foreign_id and tpis.del_flag = '0')
tpi.del_flag='0'
AND tpi.design_no LIKE concat('%',#{dto.designNo},'%')
AND tpi.style_no LIKE concat('%',#{dto.styleNo},'%')
GROUP BY tpi.id

SELECT p.*, sd.style_pic, sc.style_color_pic, sd.brand, sd.brand_name, sd.devt_type devtType, sd.devt_type_name devtTypeName, ps.pack_type, ps.enable_flag, ps.scm_send_flag, ps.bom_status, ps.confirm_status, ps.reverse_confirm_status, ps.design_tech_confirm, ps.design_tech_confirm_date, ps.bulk_order_clerk_confirm, ps.bulk_order_clerk_confirm_date, ps.bulk_prod_tech_confirm, ps.bulk_prod_tech_confirm_date, ps.post_tech_confirm, ps.post_tech_confirm_date, ps.size_lock_flag, ps.size_confirm_say, ps.size_confirm_status, ps.tech_spec_lock_flag, ps.tech_spec_confirm_say, ps.tech_spec_confirm_status, ps.tech_spec_file_id, ps.apparel_labels, ps.spec_notice, ps.special_spec_comments, ps.to_big_goods_date, ps.to_design_date, ps.bom_rhd_flag, ps.bom_rhd_date, ps.bom_rhd_user,
ps.size_rhd_flag, ps.size_rhd_date, ps.size_rhd_user,
ps.tech_rhd_flag, ps.tech_rhd_date, ps.tech_rhd_user,
ps.foreign_id as pack_foreign_id, ps.tech_spec_video_file_id, sd.receive_dept_id FROM t_pack_info p left join t_style sd on (sd.id = p.foreign_id) left join t_style_color sc on (sc.id = p.style_color_id and sc.del_flag = '0') LEFT JOIN t_pack_info_status ps on ( p.id = ps.foreign_id and IF(sc.bom_status='0',ps.pack_type='packDesign',ps.pack_type='packBigGoods') ) where p.del_flag = '0'
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
